sentences.en: A bit of gunpowder, sulphur, and potassium chlorate in a tin.
sentences.cn: 把一点火药, 硫磺, 氯酸钾放到罐子里。

sentences.en: A new Preparation of perchloric acid and sodium chlorite from sodium chlorate via - oxidation - reduction reaction is reported.
sentences.cn: 报道了在一定条件下,用氯酸钠通过歧化反应制备高氯酸和亚氯酸钠.

sentences.en: A process of electrolytic synthesis sodiumsodium chlorate solution by dioxide anode based titanium metal is introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了以钛基体二氧化铅作为阳极,电解氯酸钠合成高氯酸钠的过程.

sentences.en: Electricity is the main material for chlorate production.
sentences.cn: 电是生产氯酸盐的主要原料。

sentences.en: Happened to have some sodium chlorate lying around from a hot tub we just picked up.
sentences.cn: 碰巧有一些氯酸钠从热躺在浴缸，我们拿起左右。

sentences.en: HClO 3 a strong unstable acid with an acrid odor found in chlorate salts.
sentences.cn: 一种强但不稳定的酸,带有氯酸盐中的酸味.

sentences.en: In this paper, potassium chlorate is researched aboutthermo - dissociation by thermogravimetry ( TG ) on condition without or with catalyst.
sentences.cn: 本文用热重法分别研究了在无催化剂或有催化剂情况下 氯酸 钾的热分解 机理.

sentences.en: Melt the oxygen - chlorate, drop in some candy, and a fantastic display of fireworks will follow.
sentences.cn: 融化供氧化学物氯酸钾, 放入一些糖块, 接着,你将会看到颇具魔幻色彩的烟火表演.

sentences.en: Melt the oxygen - potassium chlorate, drop in some candy, and a fantastic display of fireworks will follow.
sentences.cn: 在氧气充足的环境下融化氯酸钾, 把一些糖果扔进将融化的氯酸钾里, 绚丽的烟花出现了.

sentences.en: Modified polymerized sulphate flocculating agent was made with ferrous sulphate heptahydrate, sulphate acid, natrium chlorate etc.
sentences.cn: 以七水硫酸亚铁 、 硫酸 、 氯酸钠等原料,制备了改性聚合硫酸铁絮凝剂.

sentences.en: Potassium Chlorate: White powders, salty, it can soluble in water.
sentences.cn: 氯酸钾: 白色粉末, 味咸, 可溶于水.

sentences.en: Sodium chlorate is a kind of mineral salt which has wide use in bleaching , dyeing, etc.
sentences.cn: 摘要氯酸钠是一种用途广泛的无机盐, 是制备二氧化氯的重要原料.

sentences.en: Sodium chlorate is a kind of mineral salt which has wide use in bleaching, dyeing, etc.
sentences.cn: 氯酸钠是一种用途广泛的无机盐，是制备二氧化氯的重要原料。

sentences.en: Sodium chlorate production process with bittern as raw material is described, and its advantages are discussed.
sentences.cn: 叙述以卤水为原料生产氯酸钠的工艺, 并阐述该工艺的生产优势.

words.tran_cn: [矿物] 绿泥石；[无化] 亚氯酸盐

trans.tran_en: any salt of chloric acid, containing the monovalent ion ClO3
